I'll try this one more time before moving on to another topic: if we 
wants to review my scenarios or work on the scenario trivia contest 
(see questions below) discussion, speak up.  Otherwise, I'll move on.

Here's the questions I would like to see answers to:

1)Name the hardest scenario (I don't mean the one with the highest 
experience level characters) and justify your answer.
2)Name the scenario that has the best NPCs and justify your answer.
3)Name the scenario that has the most usefull NPCs and justify your 
answer.
